this_title: Wraith of the Umbra and Eidolon
introduction: After receiving an assignment by three powerful phantoms, a therapist seeks by unconventional means to unlock his own redemption for previous endeavors long ago - While forcing a patient to confront the past, present, and future overseen by the three spirits, their psychology crescents in three stages.
chinese_title: Wraith of the Umbra and Eidolon
